definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: The idea that she will go abroad for further study made herself excited.
sentences.chinese: 她一想到就要出國深造，激動不已。

sentences.english: For lil' ones learning to self-feed.
sentences.chinese: 讓小寶寶深造本身喂東西喫。

sentences.english: Therefore, I want to go to your post-graduate study.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我想去貴國學習深造。

sentences.english: Ethan Christofferson and his family spent an extended time in America as he studied at Trinity Evangelical Divinity School.
sentences.chinese: 陳義聖牧師則返回美國進入三一神學院繼續深造。

sentences.english: Second if we learn English well we can study abroad easily.
sentences.chinese: 第二，如果我們學好英語，可以輕易出國深造。

sentences.english: My opinion is that the choice is right or not depending on each person.
sentences.chinese: 我的觀點是，出國深造是對是錯，在於個人。

sentences.english: With the deepening of reform and opening-up of our country, many people dream of going abroad for further study.
sentences.chinese: 隨着我國改革開放的加深，很多人夢想着出國深造。

sentences.english: Does my child have what it takes to go to university?
sentences.chinese: 我的孩子擁有上大學繼續深造的能力嗎？

sentences.english: In Moscow have heaped Christine further support.
sentences.chinese: 浚得婷支持赴莫斯科深造。

sentences.english: More comrades will be sent to study abroad.
sentences.chinese: 將派更多的同志出國深造。

sentences.english: I have lots of friends coming to U. S. C.
sentences.chinese: 我有很多朋友都來南加州大學深造。

sentences.english: Do you really want to give up the chance of further education abroad?
sentences.chinese: 你真的要放棄這次出國深造的機會嗎？

sentences.english: At the beginning of sixty time cut a striking figure painting, after study at the Xi'an Academy of Fine Arts.
sentences.chinese: 六十年代初在畫壇嶄露頭角，後深造於西安美術學院。

sentences.english: To study abroad is my goal.
The future will be quickly graduates the direct work, will test the graduate student to continue to pursue advanced studies?
sentences.chinese: 將來是趕快畢業直接工作，還是考研究生繼續深造？

sentences.english: Palacky University Medical School - An opportunity for English speaking students to attend medical school in Europe .
sentences.chinese: 爲會說英語的學生提供到歐洲的醫學院深造的機會。

definition: to undertake advanced studies/to take a refresher course
to major (in a field)/to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree
to pass an entrance exam/to be admitted to
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
to pass entrance exam/to enter college after a competitive exam
doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
to gain entry by passing an exam/to be admitted to (a college etc)
to attend (a school)/to drop out (of college etc)
to join the faculty of one's alma mater upon graduation/to remain at school during vacation
